subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After winning seven races at Lowe’s Motor Speedway from 2003 through 2006, Jimmie Johnson has become beatable at the North Carolina racetrack.
snippet: After winning seven races at Lowe’s Motor Speedway from 2003 through 2006, Jimmie Johnson has become beatable at the North Carolina racetrack.
